conversion_verification.notes: All mandatory 3D conversion elements are present.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Excellent dimensional transformation with clear wall height, thickness, perceivable interior volume, and proper corner geometry. The view is angled/isometric with good interior visibility. Roof is cleanly removed, exposing the interior without broken geometry.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Room configuration is accurate, including number of rooms, adjacency, and proportions. Major wall positions and internal partitions align well. Most doors are present, but windows are largely missing or simplified as small wall cutouts, and the main entrance is less defined.

interior_elements.notes: All major furniture (beds, sofas, tables), kitchen elements, and bathroom fixtures are present, placed in correct rooms, and have reasonable scale and logical orientation. Simplistic geometric blocks are used as expected.

visual_clarity.notes: Structural clarity is very good; walls, floors, and openings are easily distinguishable. Interior is clearly visible with good lighting. Consistent material usage and clean background contribute to high aesthetic coherence. No major rendering artifacts.

detected_errors.description: Windows are either missing or significantly simplified as minor cutouts, rather than distinct glazing elements shown in the 2D plan boundary.
The main entrance door, while indicated, is not as clearly defined or open as other interior doors, deviating slightly from the floor plan's suggestion of an open path.

summary: The 3D transformation is highly successful, demonstrating excellent fundamental conversion, strong geometric accuracy with minor issues in window representation, and very good visual clarity and interior element mapping.
